worminfo
  • Reference

Gene mapping

Gene mapping

gene(identifier, format = "gene", select = NULL)

Arguments

identifier
Identifier
format
Identifier type (gene, name, sequence, class or keyword)
select
Columns to select. Consult the gene vignette for available parameters.

Value

tibble

Examples

gene("skn-1", format = "name")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 3
#>    name           gene sequence
#>   <chr>          <chr>    <chr>
#> 1 skn-1 WBGene00004804  T19E7.2
gene("T19E7.2", format = "sequence")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 3
#>   sequence           gene  name
#>      <chr>          <chr> <chr>
#> 1  T19E7.2 WBGene00004804 skn-1
gene("WBGene00004804", select = "descriptionConcise")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 4
#>             gene sequence  name
#>            <chr>    <chr> <chr>
#> 1 WBGene00004804  T19E7.2 skn-1
#> # ... with 1 more variables: descriptionConcise <chr>
gene("daf", format = "class")
#> # A tibble: 34 × 3
#>      name           gene sequence
#>     <chr>          <chr>    <chr>
#> 1   daf-1 WBGene00000897  F29C4.1
#> 2   daf-2 WBGene00000898 Y55D5A.5
#> 3   daf-3 WBGene00000899  F25E2.5
#> 4   daf-4 WBGene00000900  C05D2.1
#> 5   daf-5 WBGene00000901  W01G7.1
#> 6   daf-6 WBGene00000902  F31F6.5
#> 7   daf-7 WBGene00000903  B0412.2
#> 8   daf-8 WBGene00000904 R05D11.1
#> 9   daf-9 WBGene00000905  T13C5.1
#> 10 daf-10 WBGene00000906  F23B2.4
#> # ... with 24 more rows
gene("bzip", format = "keyword")
#> # A tibble: 80 × 4
#>              gene keyword sequence  name
#>             <chr>   <chr>    <chr> <chr>
#> 1  WBGene00000026    bzip  F31A3.1 abu-3
#> 2  WBGene00000027    bzip  Y5H2A.3 abu-4
#> 3  WBGene00000220    bzip  K08F8.2 atf-2
#> 4  WBGene00000221    bzip T04C10.4 atf-5
#> 5  WBGene00000222    bzip  F45E6.2 atf-6
#> 6  WBGene00000223    bzip  C07G2.2 atf-7
#> 7  WBGene00000271    bzip F45E12.2 brf-1
#> 8  WBGene00000366    bzip R10E11.1 cbp-1
#> 9  WBGene00000468    bzip F43G9.11 ces-1
#> 10 WBGene00000469    bzip  ZK909.4 ces-2
#> # ... with 70 more rows
